info.name: Aywas Ugly Easier Adventure - columns
info.description: Rather than having adventure text below the exploring pictures, makes two columns with text in one, and pictures in the next. Code provided entirely by Conium!
info.additionalInfo: Forum thread here (direct link to Conium's CSS): http://www.aywas.com/forum/topic/2004478530/2/#p-4738436
